name: Mountain Nymph
description: The Mountain Nymph is a Medium-sized fey creature known for her grace and cleverness, clad in leather armor, and capable of moving effortlessly across rocky terrain.
memorable: Her ability to foresee the actions of her enemies and excel at stealth makes her a dangerous opponent.
goals: To evade capture, protect her mountain home, and ambush intruders.
relations: Often associated with other fey creatures and guardians of mountainous regions.
strengths: High Dexterity and Wisdom grants her excellent agility, perception, and stealth skills.
weaknesses: Moderate Intelligence and physical strength may hinder her in direct confrontations.
attacks: Utilizes a Multiattack with her longbow, striking from a distance effectively.
most_powerful_ability: Hunter's Foresight allows her to gain advantage against a marked target.
senses: Possesses darkvision up to 90 feet and has a passive perception of 17.
skills: Skilled in perception, stealth, and survival with a focus on evasion.
additional_information: Innate spellcasting allows her to cast spells without material components.
Point Blank Hunter trait enables effective ranged attacks in close proximity.
Mountain Walk ability allows for seamless movement across rocky surfaces.
Hunter's Mark can be cast at will, enhancing her combat effectiveness.
Can create difficult terrain with Spike Growth to hinder enemies.
spellcasting: Can cast Hunter's Mark at will, and Misty Step and Spike Growth three times per day each, with one use of Pass Without Trace.
test_queries: mountain creature skilled in stealth and archery
chaotic neutral nymph in rocky terrain
